title: Catweather
descr: A weather application that displays funny cats dressed according to current weather conditions, featuring worldwide location search, light and dark themes, responsive design, and real-time weather data powered by the OpenWeather API.

title: Headless Wordpress Shop
descr: A compact e-commerce website built with Headless WordPress/WooCommerce as a backend. The project features a modern MUI design, efficient product search, dark & light theme, optimized for both desktop and mobile devices

title: Age Counter
descr: Web application that accurately calculates a user's age based on their birthdate. It displays the exact time elapsed since birth (years, months, days, hours, minutes). Supports multiple languages, light & dark themes and a fully responsive design.

title: Carpathian Herbs Shop
descr: E-commerce store designed for portfolio purposes with category sorting, popular products, shopping cart and switch between light and dark themes.

title: Honey Shop
descr: Small e-commerce web application with smooth animations. It demonstrates essential features commonly found in online stores.

title: Compremont
descr: Computer and smartphone repair workshop website with carousel slider that showcases key offerings, and subtle element animations.

title: Food spin
descr: Website layout design based on a free template. Spinner carousel, dynamic animations, responsive design
